channel.title: rootkit on The Good Hacker
channel.description: Recent content in rootkit on The Good Hacker

item.title: Journey to the linux kernel: writing linux rootkit
item.description: Hello everyone, Starting early today to discover one of the oldest interest of mine and maybe all of the security researchers i know :) which is the rootkits. First let us know what is the rootkit. Wikipedia defenition A rootkit is a collection of computer software, typically malicious, designed to enable access to a computer or an area of its software that is not otherwise allowed (for example, to an unauthorized user) and often masks its existence or the existence of other software.
